data_mining.text:
Reservation of use for text and data mining: The owner of this website
 authorizes the use or downloading of content from this website
 by third parties for the development, training or operation of artificial
 artificial intelligence or other machine learning systems ("text and data
 data mining") only with the express written consent of the owner.
owner. Without such consent, it is prohibited to use the content for text
and data mining. This also applies if the website does not contain
meta information is available on the website that excludes such procedures, and
 even if bots that have the purpose of reading the website for the purposes of text
 and data mining purposes are not blocked.

about_me.description_location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Chemnitz and remotely.
about_me.description_open_minded: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
about_me.description_programming: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about_me.headline: About me
about_me.text: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Chemnitz. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about_me.title: Who I Am

contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work
contact.title: Contact me

feedback.kevin: Yes, you can tell from your entire structural design that coding is your thing.
feedback.prathab: The collaboration not only worked very well, but was also a lot of fun. It was a valuable experience to code with such a committed and talented partner.
feedback.title: What others say about me
feedback.valeska: Many thanks for the absolutely uncomplicated and very professional cooperation! Philipp has always implemented my requests quickly and perfectly. He manages to combine design and functionality perfectly!

projects.headline: Featured Projects

project_dialog.description_da_bubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
project_dialog.description_el_pollo_loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
project_dialog.description_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project_dialog.question: What is this project about?

skill.text: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range  of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new  technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and  stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
